attributes.description:
Face-lift edition in tip-top condition with only 31,000km and a full Honda service history. 1 owner from new! 

Includes the balance of the original 5 year/90,000km service plan and the balance of the original 5 year/200,000kms Factory warranty. 

Loads of features including leather interior with heated front seats, Apple Carplay/Android Auto, keyless entry with push button start, Reverse camera, Auto lights and rain sensing wipers, auto climate air-con, electronic park brake, LED daytime running lights, electric fold-in side mirrors and so much more... 

Finance available. Trade-ins welcome. 

-MEKOR HONDA- At your service!
